title: (4342) Architecturally designed, 3 Storied Brand New Luxury House, Thalawathugoda
details: Architecturally designed, 3 Storied Brand New Luxury House with Modern Amenities in a sort after highly Residential area in Thalawathugoda. Very close to all Super Markets, Banks, transport and other public facilities. Comprises 4 bedrooms Balconies, 4 toilets, double garage with roller doors, separate driver, maids quarters with toilets, Terraces, Professionally Landscape Garden, modern pantry and separate oriental kitchen fitted with European Cooker, Hob Hood, living, dinning and TV lobby. 3 Phase Electricity, Roof top entertainment area being the highlight of this valuable property. Pip Born Water and 3 Phase Electricity 31 Million (Negotiable)
